problems.title: Longest Substring with At Most K Distinct Characters
problems.description:
Given a string s and an integer K, find the length of the longest substring that contains at most K distinct characters.

Input Format:
First line: string s (no spaces).
Second line: integer K.

Output Format:
Print a single integer: the length of the longest valid substring.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
araaci
2

Sample Output
4

Explanation:
The longest substring with at most 2 distinct characters is 'araa' with length 4.
hintsList: Use a sliding window and a frequency map to track the count of each character.
If the number of distinct characters exceeds K, move the left pointer and decrease counts until it becomes at most K again.
